DOC.brief_summary: A study to determine the optimal dose and blood level of Prograf® in long-term maintenance of kidney transplant patients.
DOC.brief_title: Optimizing Prograf® Therapy in Renal Transplant Patients
DOC.detailed_description: A 3 arm study (2 Active, 1 Active Control) to determine the optimal dose and blood level of Prograf® in long-term maintenance of kidney transplant patients
DOC.criteria: Patient was 18 years of age at the time of transplant. Patient is at least 6 months posttransplant. Patient is the recipient of a solid organ transplant other than the kidney. Patient is a known carrier of any of the HIV viruses.
